title: FS: Lot of 5 Unfortunate T206s--- all sold.
author: christopher.herman

posts.post_title: FS: Lot of 5 Unfortunate T206s--- all sold.
posts.post_content:
Hello fellow Net54'ers:
Free shipping as usual. Paypal gift preferred.

As you can see from the scans each of these T206's has it's own unique personality:

Mike Powers: significant paper loss on reverse (probably from scrapbook mounting)
Mickey Doolin: large tear from top left to his head
Sherry Magee: very dirty (tobacco) on front, blue color staining (transfer?) on back, crease left side
Dolly Gray: large crease on bottom, bent top left corner
Buck Herzog: well, see for yourself....

I'll take 50 bucks for the lot. PMs get priority in order received.
Interesting trades always welcome. Show me what you got.
-Chris.

[URL="http://tinypic.com?ref=2rnk3rs"][IMG]http://i42.tinypic.com/2rnk3rs.jpg[/IMG][/URL]
[URL="http://tinypic.com?ref=1zc01sj"][IMG]http://i42.tinypic.com/1zc01sj.jpg[/IMG][/URL]

I'll take them. PM sent.
Jeff
